sub_title: A proactive marketing leader, known for devising and implementing creative strategies with an emphasis on achieving brand growth.
summary:
Hi, I am an entrepreneurial-minded leader who has a proven track record of ensuring consistent attainment of set goals. I have been adept at resolving problems, building powerful brands, reversing negative brand metrics/sales trends, controlling costs, developing talent, increasing sales volume, and boosting profitability by devising/deploying creative approaches and effective methodologies.

I have a solid history of success implementing optimal resource allocation aimed at enhancing business productivity. I have proven ability to develop effective marketing plans and engaging media campaigns with a positive outlook on establishing strong brand reputation and improving audience reach.

I am a customer-centric professional with comprehensive experience of developing/executing full spectrum of global marketing/brand management. I am competent at streamlining diverse range of global marketing operations, providing consumer insights, analysing organisation's needs, identifying deficiencies/opportunities, and providing robust solutions. I am deeply familiar with all aspects of pushing boundaries of innovation in market as well as managing innovation funnel for different product lines with a positive outlook on boosting profitability.

I have been consistently recognized as an articulate communicator who excels at building and strengthening collaborative relationships by engaging with C-level decision-makers and key stakeholders at all levels. 

Some of my relevant key expertise are:
Brand Marketing & Development | Brand Image & Revenue Optimisation | Sales Promotion & Initiatives | Market Research & Trend Analysis | Budget & Portfolio Management | Resource Allocation | Team Development & Leadership

Should you have any further questions regarding my professional experience or skills, feel free to connect with me via phone or email. I always enjoy making new acquaintances.

profile_positions.title: Vice President, Global Brand & Corporate Marketing Communications

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I own control over all operations associated with global expansion of Heineken's international premium portfolio, involving finest craft lagers, wheat beers, and IPAs. I streamline overall operational workflow by overseeing several marketing operations, such as positioning, brand strategy, communication, innovation, sourcing, and international roll-out & footprint.
My key contributions to this role are:
•	Designated as a Global Brand Director for Birra Moretti, Lagunitas and Edelweiss.
•	Boosted revenue by leading three premium brands globally, while diversifying launch into 20+ markets.
•	Projected more than double in revenue and volume by 2025 through robust growth plans implementation, while accelerating brand initiatives to enhance innovation and visual identity.
profile_positions.title: Global Brand & Marketing Director Premium Beer Portfolio

profile_positions.description:
During this time, I supervised all facets of applying local portfolio strategies and driving different channels for Heineken's operating companies' growth. I contributed to enhancing business productivity by implementing optimal resource allocation. I created and executed five-year portfolio strategy to serve different operating companies' magnitude and requirements.
My notable accomplishments of this role are:
•	Upgraded portfolio strategy of Heineken in Brazil, Russia, Spain, France, Hungary, Romania, Ireland, Belgium, Slovenia, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Nigeria, Ethiopia, Congo, Haiti, Jamaica; part of PMI task force in Brazil, Jamaica, and Slovenia.
•	Attained high double-digit growth on premium revenue in two years and increased return on investment through portfolio strategy implementation.
profile_positions.title: Global Head Portfolio Strategy

profile_positions.description:
Throughout this role, I supervised all aspects of global consumer and market intelligence teams for innovation, premium beer, and cider brands. I was mainly involved in administration of end-to-end brand operations, involving reforming strategies, positioning, and setting pack/price/channels via consumers' insights, trends, and validations of recipes, packs, and campaigns.
My major contributions to this role are:
•	Transformed customer insights into actionable business initiatives by engaging as voice of the consumer.
•	Accomplished Radlers launch in 40 markets by introducing top-tier recipe and packs for all markets.
•	Enhanced global brand positioning of Affligem, Sol, Strongbow, Bulmers, Amstel, Red Stripe brands and maximised incremental sales by optimising pricing strategies and cannibalization turnaround initiatives to differentiate brands.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of CMI – Innovation, International Beer & Cider Brands

profile_positions.description:
During this role, I pushed boundaries of innovation in market as well as managed innovation funnel for different product lines, including Sleep Devices (Combining Philips Medical & Consumer Electronics Expertise), New Floor Care Devices, and Water & Air Devices.
I employed my proven expertise to conduct consumer research for product development as well as drove all operations of small start-up, to bring different products to market, involving launch and comms, and product life lifecycle management. I spearheaded the introduction of innovative sleep aid devices in market such as sleep apnea, insomnia devices, jet-lag and winter blues' lights.
My major accomplishments to this role are:
•	Ensured business growth by launching and bringing many new products to market.
•	Generated new revenue stream by introducing first wet-cleaning portfolio "vacuum cleaning with wet mopping" in Asian and European markets.
•	Pioneered alternative sales channels in Latin America to launch water business – TV Home Shopping, Home sales
